title: Topic 003 Question 001
body: Note: This question is part of a series of questions that present the same scenario. Each question in the series contains a unique solution that might meet the stated goals. Some question sets might have more than one correct solution, while others might not have a correct solution.
After you answer a question in this section, you will NOT be able to return to it. As a result, these questions will not appear in the review screen.
You build a language model by using a Language Understanding service. The language model is used to search for information on a contact list by using an intent named FindContact.
A conversational expert provides you with the following list of phrases to use for training.
✑ Who do I know in Seattle?
You need to implement the phrase list in Language Understanding.
Solution: You create a new pattern in the FindContact intent.
